trans-unit.source: Represents a single ink stroke.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un singolo tratto input penna.

trans-unit.source: A Stroke is the data object that is collected from a pointing device, such as a tablet pen or a mouse.
trans-unit.target: Un tratto è l'oggetto dati raccolti da un dispositivo di puntamento, ad esempio una penna o il mouse.

trans-unit.source: The Stroke can be created and manipulated programmatically, and can be represented visually on an ink-enabled element, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: Il tratto può essere creato e modificato a livello di codice e può essere rappresentato visivamente un elemento di input penna abilitato, ad esempio <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>

trans-unit.source: A Stroke contains information about both its position and appearance.
trans-unit.target: Un tratto contiene informazioni sulla relativa posizione e l'aspetto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.StylusPoints%2A> property is a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects that specifies the position of the Stroke.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.StylusPoints%2A>proprietà è una raccolta di <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>gli oggetti che specifica la posizione del tratto.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.StylusPoints%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> property specifies a stroke's appearance.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>proprietà specifica l'aspetto del tratto.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> that represents the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> che rappresenta il <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: stylusPoints is .
trans-unit.target: stylusPointsis .

trans-unit.source: stylusPoints is empty..
trans-unit.target: stylusPointsè vuoto...

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> that represents the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> che rappresenta il <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> object that specifies the appearance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"> </xref> oggetto che specifica l'aspetto del <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: stylusPoints is .
trans-unit.target: stylusPointsis .

trans-unit.source: -or- drawingAtrributes is .
trans-unit.target: -or- drawingAtrributes is .

trans-unit.source: stylusPoints is empty.
trans-unit.target: stylusPointsè vuoto.

trans-unit.source: Adds a custom property to the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge una proprietà personalizzata per il <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you need to store extra information in the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo è utile se si desidera archiviare informazioni aggiuntive in <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier for the property.
trans-unit.target: Identificatore univoco per la proprietà.

trans-unit.source: The value of the custom property.
trans-unit.target: Il valore della proprietà personalizzata.

trans-unit.source: `propertyData` must be of type <xref:System.Char>, <xref:System.Byte>,<xref:System.Int16>,,<xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt64>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.DateTime>, <xref:System.Boolean>, <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal> or an array of these data types, except <xref:System.String>, which is not allowed.
trans-unit.target: `propertyData`deve essere di tipo <xref:System.Char>, <xref:System.Byte>,<xref:System.Int16>,<xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt64>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.DateTime>, <xref:System.Boolean>, <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>o una matrice di questi tipi di dati, ad eccezione di <xref:System.String>, che non è consentito.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Decimal> </xref:System.String> </xref:System.Boolean> </xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.Double> </xref:System.Single> </xref:System.UInt64> </xref:System.Int64> </xref:System.UInt32> </xref:System.Int32> </xref:System.UInt16> </xref:System.Int16> </xref:System.Byte> </xref:System.Char>

trans-unit.source: The propertyData argument is not one of the allowed data types listed in the section.
trans-unit.target: Il propertyData argomento non è uno dei tipi di dati consentiti nel sezione.

trans-unit.source: Returns a deep copy of the existing <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce una copia completa dell'oggetto esistente <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The properties of an object that is a deep copy of another object have the same values as the properties of the original object.
trans-unit.target: Le proprietà di un oggetto che è una copia completa di un altro oggetto hanno gli stessi valori di proprietà dell'oggetto originale.

trans-unit.source: The new <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Il nuovo <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> object contains the specified custom property.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> oggetto contiene la proprietà personalizzata specificata.

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier for the property.
trans-unit.target: Identificatore univoco per la proprietà.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the custom property exists; otherwise, returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se la proprietà personalizzata esiste; in caso contrario, restituisce <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Renders the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> object based upon the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Esegue il rendering di <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> oggetto in base al specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"></xref> object onto which the stroke will be rendered.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"> </xref> in cui verrà visualizzato il tratto dell'oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Renders the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> object based upon the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Esegue il rendering di <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> oggetto in base al specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"></xref> object onto which the stroke will be rendered.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"> </xref> in cui verrà visualizzato il tratto dell'oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> object defining the attributes of the stroke that is drawn.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"> </xref> oggetto che definisce gli attributi del tratto disegnato.

trans-unit.source: Renders the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> on the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"></xref> using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Esegue il rendering di <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> sull'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"> </xref> utilizzando l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Override the DrawCore method to perform custom drawing when you inherit from the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> class.
trans-unit.target: Eseguire l'override del metodo DrawCore per eseguire il disegno personalizzato quando si eredita dalla <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"></xref> object onto which the stroke will be rendered.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"> </xref> in cui verrà visualizzato il tratto dell'oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> object defining the attributes of the stroke that is drawn.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"> </xref> oggetto che definisce gli attributi del tratto disegnato.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"> </xref> per il <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: These attributes, such as color and width, are applied to the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> object as it is drawn.
trans-unit.target: Questi attributi, ad esempio colore e larghezza, vengono applicati per il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>dell'oggetto come viene disegnato.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: Changing DrawingAttributes causes the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributesChanged> event to fire.
trans-unit.target: La modifica di DrawingAttributes provoca il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributesChanged>dell'evento da generare.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributesChanged>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: The set value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore impostato è <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributes*> associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> object change.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributes*>associato il <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> modifica dell'oggetto.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributes*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs> contains information about the property that changed.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs>contiene informazioni sulla proprietà modificata.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: You can compare the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs.PropertyGuid%2A> property against the members of <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributeIds> to see which value changed.
trans-unit.target: È possibile confrontare il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs.PropertyGuid%2A>proprietà con i membri di <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributeIds>per vedere quale valore modificato.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributeIds> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs.PropertyGuid%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the drawing attributes of a <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> object are replaced.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando gli attributi di disegno di un <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> oggetto vengono sostituite.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Returns the stylus points the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> uses when <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce i punti dello stilo il <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> utilizza quando <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve*>è <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve*>

trans-unit.source: The GetBezierStylusPoints method returns a new <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> that contains the stylus points that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> uses when the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A> property on the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributes%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo GetBezierStylusPoints restituisce un nuovo <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>che contiene lo stilo che punta il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>utilizza al momento il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A>proprietà il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributes%2A>è impostata su `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributes%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>

trans-unit.source: To get the stylus points that are used when <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A> is set to `false`, use the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.StylusPoints%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Per ottenere i punti dello stilo che vengono utilizzate quando <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A>è impostato su `false`, utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.StylusPoints%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.StylusPoints%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> that contains the stylus points along the spine of a <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> when <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> che contiene i punti dello stilo lungo la traccia di un <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> quando <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve*>è <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve*>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the bounding box for the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Recupera il rettangolo di selezione per il <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> structure defining the bounding box for the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref> casella struttura definisce il rettangolo di selezione per il <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Returns segments of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> that are within the specified bounds.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce i segmenti dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> che rientrano nei limiti specificati.

trans-unit.source: The GetClipResult method returns a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> that contains strokes that represent the segments of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> that is within `lassoPoints`.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo GetClipResult restituisce un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>che contiene i tratti che rappresentano i segmenti del <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>che rientra `lassoPoints`.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>

trans-unit.source: GetClipResult does not change the original <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: GetClipResult non modifica originale <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: The GetClipResult method connects the first and last points in `lassoPoints` to create the lasso.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo GetClipResult connette il primo e ultimo punto in `lassoPoints` per creare il lazo.

trans-unit.source: The points that specify the line which defines where to clip.
trans-unit.target: I punti che specificano la riga che definisce dove ritagliare.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> that contains copies of the segments of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> that are within the specified bounds.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref> che contiene copie dei segmenti dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> che rientrano nei limiti specificati.

trans-unit.source: Returns segments of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> that are within the specified rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce i segmenti dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> che sono all'interno del rettangolo specificato.

trans-unit.source: The GetClipResult method returns a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> that contains strokes that represent the segments of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> that is within `bounds`.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo GetClipResult restituisce un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>che contiene i tratti che rappresentano i segmenti del <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>che rientra `bounds`.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>

trans-unit.source: GetClipResult does not change the original <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: GetClipResult non modifica originale <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> that specifies the area to clip.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref> che specifica l'area di ritaglio.

trans-unit.source: A that contains copies of the segments of the current that are within the bounds of bounds.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che contiene copie dei segmenti dell'oggetto corrente che sono all'interno di bounds .

trans-unit.source: Returns segments of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> that are outside the specified bounds.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce i segmenti dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> che sono esterni ai limiti specificati.

trans-unit.source: The GetEraseResult method returns a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> that contains strokes that represent the segments of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> that are outside of `lassoPoints`.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo GetEraseResult restituisce un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>che contiene i tratti che rappresentano i segmenti del <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>all'esterno di `lassoPoints`.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>

trans-unit.source: GetEraseResult does not change the original <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: GetEraseResult non modifica originale <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.GetClipResult%2A> method connects the first and last points in `lassoPoints` to create the lasso.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.GetClipResult%2A>metodo connette i punti e il cognome in `lassoPoints` per creare il lazo.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.GetClipResult%2A>

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> that specifies the area to erase.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di tipo <xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref> che specifica l'area da cancellare.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> that contains the segments of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> that are outside the specified bounds.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref> contenente i segmenti dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> che sono esterni ai limiti specificati.

trans-unit.source: Returns segments of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> that are outside the specified rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce i segmenti dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> appartenenti all'esterno del rettangolo specificato.

trans-unit.source: The GetEraseResult method returns a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> that contains strokes that represent the segments of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> that are outside of `bounds`.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo GetEraseResult restituisce un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>che contiene i tratti che rappresentano i segmenti del <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>all'esterno di `bounds`.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>

trans-unit.source: GetEraseResult does not change the original <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: GetEraseResult non modifica originale <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> that specifies the area to erase.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref> che specifica l'area da cancellare.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> that contains the segments of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> that are outside the bounds of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref> contenente i segmenti dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> che rientrano nei limiti dell'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the segments of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> after it is dissected by the designated path using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce i segmenti dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> dopo che viene sezionato dal percorso definito utilizzando l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The GetEraseResult method uses `eraserShape` to hit test the stroke along `eraserPath` and returns a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> that represent dissected segments.
trans-unit.target: Usa il metodo GetEraseResult `eraserShape` da sottoporre a hit test lungo tratto `eraserPath` e restituisce un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>che rappresentano sezionati.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>

trans-unit.source: GetEraseResult does not change the original <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: GetEraseResult non modifica originale <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> that specifies the path that dissects the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di tipo <xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref> che specifica il percorso che seziona il <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape"></xref> that specifies the shape of the eraser.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape"> </xref> che specifica la forma della gomma.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> that contains copies of the segments of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> after it is dissected by the specified path.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref> che contiene copie dei segmenti dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> dopo che viene sezionato dal percorso specificato.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> corrente <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the GetGeometry method to get a <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry> to customize the shape of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il metodo GetGeometry per ottenere un <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry>per personalizzare la forma di <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry>

trans-unit.source: Consider caching the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> to avoid calling GetGeometry multiple times, which may impact performance.
trans-unit.target: Prendere in considerazione la memorizzazione nella cache il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>per evitare di chiamare GetGeometry più volte, che può influire sulle prestazioni.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> that represents the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> che rappresenta il <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> corrente <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> utilizzando l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The GetGeometry method uses the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A> properties of `drawingAttributes` to determine the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo GetGeometry utilizza il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A>le proprietà di `drawingAttributes` per determinare la <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: Consider caching the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> to avoid calling GetGeometry multiple times, which may impact performance.
trans-unit.target: Prendere in considerazione la memorizzazione nella cache il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>per evitare di chiamare GetGeometry più volte, che può influire sulle prestazioni.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> that determines the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"> </xref> che determina il <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> del <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> that represents the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> che rappresenta il <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the property data for the specified GUID.
trans-unit.target: Recupera i dati di proprietà per il GUID specificato.

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier for the property.
trans-unit.target: Identificatore univoco per la proprietà.

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_object" name="object" href=""></xref> containing the property data.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref uid="langword_csharp_object" name="object" href=""> </xref> contenente i dati della proprietà.

trans-unit.source: propertyDataId is not associated with a custom property of the .
trans-unit.target: propertyDataIdnon è associata a una proprietà personalizzata del .

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the GUIDs of any custom properties associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Recupera il GUID di qualsiasi proprietà personalizzate associate di <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Guid> objects.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di <xref:System.Guid>oggetti.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether current <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> intersects the specified point.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un valore che indica se corrente <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> interseca il punto specificato.

trans-unit.source: This method behaves the same way as the overloaded <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.HitTest%28System.Windows.Point%2CSystem.Double%29> method does when `diameter` is 1.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo funziona esattamente come il metodo di overload <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.HitTest%28System.Windows.Point%2CSystem.Double%29>metodo esegue quando `diameter` è 1.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.HitTest%28System.Windows.Point%2CSystem.Double%29>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> to hit test.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref> da sottoporre a hit test.

trans-unit.source: if point intersects the current stroke; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Se point interseca il tratto corrente; in caso contrario, .

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the current <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> is within the specified bounds.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un valore che indica se l'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> è entro i limiti specificati.

trans-unit.source: The HitTest method connects the first and last points in `lassoPoints` to create the lasso.
trans-unit.target: HitTest (metodo) si connette il primo e ultimo punto in `lassoPoints` per creare il lazo.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> that represents the bounds of the area to hit test.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di tipo <xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref> che rappresenta i limiti dell'area da sottoporre a hit test.

trans-unit.source: The percentage of the length of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>, that must be in `lassoPoints` for the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> to be considered hit.
trans-unit.target: La percentuale della lunghezza del <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>, che deve essere in `lassoPoints` per il <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> per essere considerato un riscontro.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current stroke is within the specified bounds; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il tratto corrente si trova entro i limiti specificati; in caso contrario <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the specified path intersects the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce se il percorso specificato interseca il <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> utilizzando l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The HitTest method uses `stylusShape` to hit test the stroke along `eraserPath`.
trans-unit.target: HitTest (metodo) utilizza `stylusShape` da sottoporre a hit test lungo tratto `eraserPath`.

trans-unit.source: The path that `stylusShape` follows for hit testing
trans-unit.target: Il percorso che `stylusShape` segue per l'hit test

trans-unit.source: The shape of `path` with which to hit test.
trans-unit.target: La forma di `path` con cui eseguire l'hit test.

trans-unit.source: if stylusShape intersects the current stroke; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Se stylusShape interseca il tratto corrente; in caso contrario, .

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether current <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> intersects the specified area.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un valore che indica se corrente <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> interseca l'area specificata.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> that defines the center of the area to hit test.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref> che definisce il centro dell'area da sottoporre a hit test.

trans-unit.source: The diameter of the area to hit test.
trans-unit.target: Diametro dell'area da sottoporre a hit test.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified area intersects the current stroke; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'area specificata interseca il tratto corrente; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> is within the bounds of the specified rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> è entro i limiti del rettangolo specificato.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> that represents the bounds of the area to hit test.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref> che rappresenta i limiti dell'area da sottoporre a hit test.

trans-unit.source: The percentage of the length of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>, that must be in `percentageWithinBounds` for the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> to be considered hit..
trans-unit.target: La percentuale della lunghezza del <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>, che deve essere in `percentageWithinBounds` per il <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> per essere considerato un riscontro...

trans-unit.source: if the current stroke is within the bounds of bounds; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Se il tratto corrente si trova entro i limiti di bounds ; in caso contrario, .

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the appearance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> changes.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando l'aspetto del <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> le modifiche.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter> handles the Invalidated event and calls the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawCore%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter>gestisce l'evento Invalidated e chiama il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawCore%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawCore%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter>

trans-unit.source: If you inherit from the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> class and your stroke's appearance is based on a custom state, you must call the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.OnInvalidated%2A> method to raise the Invalidated event.
trans-unit.target: Se si eredita dalla <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>classe e l'aspetto del tratto si basa su uno stato personalizzato, è necessario chiamare il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.OnInvalidated%2A>metodo per generare l'evento Invalidated.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.OnInvalidated%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Allows derived classes to modify the default behavior of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributesChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Consente alle classi derivate di modificare il comportamento predefinito del <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributesChanged"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: When overriding this method in a derived class, call the OnDrawingAttributesChanged method of the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando si esegue l'override di questo metodo in una classe derivata, chiamare il metodo OnDrawingAttributesChanged della classe di base in modo che i delegati registrati ricevano l'evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs"></xref> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs"> </xref> oggetto che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Allows derived classes to modify the default behavior of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributesReplaced"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Consente alle classi derivate di modificare il comportamento predefinito del <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributesReplaced"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: When overriding this method in a derived class, call the OnDrawingAttributesReplaced method of the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando si esegue l'override di questo metodo in una classe derivata, chiamare il metodo OnDrawingAttributesReplaced della classe di base in modo che i delegati registrati ricevano l'evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributesReplacedEventArgs"></xref> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributesReplacedEventArgs"> </xref> oggetto che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.Invalidated"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.Invalidated"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: If you inherit from the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> class and your stroke's appearance is based on a custom state, you must call the OnInvalidated method to raise the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.Invalidated> event.
trans-unit.target: Se si eredita dalla <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>classe e l'aspetto del tratto si basa su uno stato personalizzato, è necessario chiamare il metodo OnInvalidated per generare il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.Invalidated>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.Invalidated> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter> handles the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.Invalidated> event and calls the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawCore%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter>handle il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.Invalidated>eventi e chiamate di <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawCore%2A>(metodo).</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawCore%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.Invalidated> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.EventArgs>che contiene i dati dell'evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when any <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando una qualsiasi <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> le modifiche alle proprietà.

trans-unit.source: The event data that describes the property that changed, as well as old and new values.
trans-unit.target: I dati dell'evento che descrive la proprietà modificata, nonché i valori vecchi e nuovi.

trans-unit.source: Allows derived classes to modify the default behavior of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.PropertyDataChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Consente alle classi derivate di modificare il comportamento predefinito del <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.PropertyDataChanged"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: When overriding this method in a derived class, call the OnPropertyDataChanged method of the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando si esegue l'override di questo metodo in una classe derivata, chiamare il metodo OnPropertyDataChanged della classe di base in modo che i delegati registrati ricevano l'evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs"></xref> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs"> </xref> oggetto che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.StylusPointsChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.StylusPointsChanged"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.EventArgs>che contiene i dati dell'evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.StylusPointsReplaced"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.StylusPointsReplaced"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StylusPointsReplacedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StylusPointsReplacedEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the custom properties on a <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> object changes.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando le proprietà personalizzate in un <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> modifiche dell'oggetto.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Deletes a custom property from the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Elimina una proprietà personalizzata dal <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier for the property.
trans-unit.target: Identificatore univoco per la proprietà.

trans-unit.source: Returns the stylus points of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce i punti dello stilo del <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To get the stylus points that are used when the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A> property on the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributes%2A> property is set to `true`, use the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.GetBezierStylusPoints%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per ottenere i punti dello stilo utilizzato quando il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A>proprietà il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributes%2A>è impostata su `true`, utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.GetBezierStylusPoints%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.GetBezierStylusPoints%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributes%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> assigned to the StylusPoints property must have at least one <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> in it.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>Assegnato a StylusPoints proprietà deve avere almeno un <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>veniva modificato.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>

trans-unit.source: If you try to assign an empty <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> to StylusPoints, or remove all the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects from StylusPoints, an exception occurs.
trans-unit.target: Se si tenta di assegnare un oggetto vuoto <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>a StylusPoints, oppure rimuovere tutti i <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>oggetti da StylusPoints, viene generata un'eccezione.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> that contains the stylus points that represent the current <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> che contiene i punti dello stilo che rappresentano corrente <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.StylusPoints*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.StylusPoints*>le modifiche alle proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.StylusPoints*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.StylusPoints*> property is assigned a new <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.StylusPoints*>proprietà viene assegnato un nuovo <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.StylusPoints*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Performs a transformation based upon the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Esegue una trasformazione in base al tipo specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix> object represents a 3x3 matrix used for transformations in two-dimensional space.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix>oggetto rappresenta una 3x3 matrice usata per le trasformazioni nello spazio bidimensionale.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix>

trans-unit.source: Each point of the Stroke object is transformed by the supplied Matrix.
trans-unit.target: Ogni punto dell'oggetto Stroke viene trasformato dalla matrice fornita.

trans-unit.source: For example if the original Point.X value is 100, the original Point.Y value is 55, and the transformation Matrix.Scale(0.5, 0.5), the new Point.X value is 50 and the new Point.Y value is 27.5.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio se il valore originale di Point è 100, il valore originale di Point è 55 e la trasformazione Matrix. Scale (0,5, 0,5), il nuovo valore Point è 50 e il nuovo valore di Point è 27,5.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"></xref> object defining the transformation.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"> </xref> oggetto che definisce la trasformazione.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to apply the transformation to the tip of the stylus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Per applicare la trasformazione per la punta dello stilo; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
